div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: Concepts required in recommendations that are not defined elsewhere for the project DIGIPOD

name.value: DIGIPOD to standardized vocabularies

description.value: Concept map from concepts defined in DIGIPOD to standardized vocabularies

name.value: Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperative at Risk for POD

description.value: Adult patients before undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia and being at risk for postoperative delirium

name.value: Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively with Positive Mini-cog Test Score

description.value: Adult patients with a positive Mini-cog test score before undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia

name.value: Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively with Positive Mini-cog Test Score that need a Mini-Mental State Examination

description.value: Adult patients with a positive Mini-cog test score that need a Mini-Mental State Examination before undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively

description.value: Adult patients during an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively On Normal Ward, With a RASS Equal Or Lower Than -3

description.value: Adult patients after undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia, on normal ward, with a RASS of -3 or less.

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on the Surgery Day on an Intensive Care Unit

description.value: Adult patients after undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia, on the day of the surgical intervention (from the time of completion of the procedure to midnight), on an intensive care unit.

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on the Surgery Day on Normal Ward or in the Recovery Room

description.value: Adult patients after undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia, on the day of the surgical intervention (from the time of completion of the procedure to midnight), in the recovery room or on normal ward.

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Pre- and Intraoperatively

description.value: Adult patients before and/or during an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively

description.value: Adult patients before undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia

name.value: Population: General Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively on Surgery Day and Before

description.value: Adult patients before undergoing an elective surgical intervention of any type independently of the type of anesthesia, on the day of the surgical intervention or maximum 42 days before.

name.value: Population: Older Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively

description.value: Adult patients being 70 years old or older, before undergoing a surgical intervention of any type

name.value: Recommendation 0.1: Preoperative screening of delirium

description.value: Recommendation number 0.1 (Prerequisite) from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 0.2: Postoperative screening of delirium

description.value: Recommendation number 0.2 (Prerequisite) from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 2.1: Preoperative Risk Factors

description.value: Recommendation number 2.1 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 3.1: Preventive Measures I (Effects of Drugs on POD prevention) - Drugs as prophylactic measure to reduce the incidence of POD

description.value: Recommendation number 3.1 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 3.2: Preventive Measures I (Effects of Drugs on POD prevention) - Preventive dexmedetomidine administration intra- or postoperative

description.value: Recommendation number 3.2 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 3.3: Preventive Measures I (Effects of Drugs on POD prevention) - Type of surgery or anesthesia to reduce the incidence of POD

description.value: Recommendation number 3.3 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 3.4: Preventive Measures I (Effects of Drugs on POD prevention) - Biomarker to identify patients at risk of POD

description.value: Recommendation number 3.4 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 4.1: Preventive Measures II (Non Pharmacological Interventions) - Screening for risk factors and optimizing preoperative status in older adults

description.value: Recommendation number 4.1 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 4.2: Preventive Measures II (Non Pharmacological Interventions) - Sharing, discussing and documenting results of risk factors and preventive strategies

description.value: Recommendation number 4.2 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 4.3: Preventive Measures II (Non Pharmacological Interventions) - Multi-component non-pharmacological interventions in all patients at risk for POD

description.value: Recommendation number 4.3 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 5.1: Neuromonitoring - EEG monitoring depth of anesthesia guidance

description.value: Recommendation number 5.1 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 5.2: Neuromonitoring - Multi-parameter, intraoperative EEG monitoring during anesthesia

description.value: Recommendation number 5.2 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 6.1: Pharmacological Treatment of POD and POD Outcomes - Low-dose haloperidol as treatment

description.value: Recommendation number 6.1 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 6.2: Pharmacological Treatment of POD and POD Outcomes - Benzodiazepines as treatment

description.value: Recommendation number 6.2 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation 6.3: Pharmacological Treatment of POD and POD Outcomes - Dexmedetomidine as treatment in patients with cardiac surgery

description.value: Recommendation number 6.3 from Guideline 'Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients'

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Check risk factors in Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that will undergo a surgical intervention: Check risk factors age, American Society of Anesthesiology Physical status score (ASA), Charlson Comorbidity Index (CCI) and Mini-cog test score (Mini-cog). If Mini-cog test score is equal to or higher than 3, perform Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA), Addenbrooke's Cognitive Examination (ACE-R) or Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE). Please note that MMSE is not free of charge (license fees)

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Do no suggest any specific type of surgery and type of anaesthesia to reduce the incidence of POD in Adult Surgical Patients Pre- or Intraoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients before or during a surgical intervention: Do no suggest any specific type of surgery and type of anaesthesia to reduce the incidence of postoperative delirium (POD).

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Do no suggest using any single specific biomarker to identify patients at risk of POD in Adult Surgical Patients Pre- or Intraoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients before or during a surgical intervention: Do no suggest using any single specific biomarker to identify patients at risk of postoperative delirium (POD).

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Perform Baseline Delirium Screening in Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that will undergo a surgical intervention: Perform baseline delirium screening.

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Perform Delirium Screening in Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on surgery day during the evening shift

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that had a surgical intervention: Perform delirium screening on surgery day during the evening shift.

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Perform Delirium Screening in Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on surgery day during the morning shift

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that had a surgical intervention: Perform delirium screening on surgery day during the morning shift.

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Perform Delirium Screening in Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on surgery day during the night shift

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that had a surgical intervention: Perform delirium screening on surgery day during the night shift.

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Perform Delirium Screening in Adult Surgical Patients Postoperatively on surgery day, ideally once a shift and at least twice a day

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients that had a surgical intervention: Perform delirium screening on surgery day, ideally once a shift and at least twice a day.

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Use Index-based EEG monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance in Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients during a surgical intervention: Use Index-based EEG monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance

name.value: Recommendation Collection: Use multiparameter EEG monitoring in Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively

description.value: Recommendation collection for adult patients during a surgical intervention: Use multiparameter electroencephalographic (EEG) monitoring focusing on burst suppression activity and including the density spectral array (DSA).

name.value: Recommended Action for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively, perform monitoring burst suppression pattern using electroencephalography

description.value: Recommended Action for Adult Surgical Patients, Intraoperatively, burst suppression patterns should be monitored using electroencephalography (EEG).

name.value: Recommended Action for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively, use electroencephalographic density spectral array

description.value: Recommended Action for Adult Surgical Patients, Intraoperatively, EEG monitoring must include density spectral array (DSA)

name.value: Recommended Action for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Intraoperatively, use Index-based EEG monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance

description.value: Recommended Action for Adult Surgical Patients, Intraoperatively, use Index-based EEG monitoring depth of anaesthesia guidance to decrease the risk of POD.

name.value: Recommended Plan for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively with Positive Mini-cog Test Score, check risk factor Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) score, Addenbrooke's Cognitive Examination revised (ACE-R) score or Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) score

description.value: Recommended Plan for Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively if Mini-cog test score is equal to or higher than 3, check risk factors Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) score, Addenbrooke's Cognitive Examination revised (ACE-R) score or Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) score.

name.value: Recommended Plan for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively, check risk factors age, ASA, CCI and Mini-cog

description.value: Recommended Plan for Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively, check risk factors age, American Society of Anesthesiology Physical status score (ASA), Charlson Comorbidity Index (CCI) and Mini-cog test score (Mini-cog).

name.value: Recommended Plan for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively, Perform Baseline Delirium Screening

description.value: Recommended Plan for Adult Surgical Patients Preoperatively, perform baseline delirium screening.

name.value: Update of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients

description.value: Evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients, updated by the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine (ESAIC) in 2021
